title: Episode 384 as Essential Character Development
theoryText: Despite being filler, Episode 384 provides essential character development for Brook that many fans consider more important than some canon episodes. The episode explores Brook's psychology and insecurities in a way the manga never addressed, making it valuable viewing even for manga-only readers.
author: Reddit user (r/OnePiece)

title: Robin and Brook's Parallel Journeys
theoryText: Episode 384 deliberately parallels Robin and Brook's experiences as outcasts who found family with the Straw Hats. Both characters had dark, lonely pasts and struggled with feeling worthy of the crew's acceptance. Robin's reference to Enies Lobby when consoling Brook suggests the writers intended to draw this parallel, making Brook the spiritual successor to Robin's arc.
author: One Piece analysis community
